Package org.opencastproject.oaipmh.server

Class DefaultRepository

java.lang.Object
org.opencastproject.oaipmh.server.OaiPmhRepository
org.opencastproject.oaipmh.server.DefaultRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.osgi.service.cm.ManagedService
public class DefaultRepository extends OaiPmhRepository
Factory for the default OAI-PMH repository that ships with each Opencast installation serving the matterhorn metadata format.

    • getRepositoryMetadataProviders

      public List<MetadataProvider> getRepositoryMetadataProviders()
      Description copied from class: OaiPmhRepository
      Return a list of available metadata providers. Please do not expose the default provider for the mandatory oai_dc format since this is automatically added when calling OaiPmhRepository.getMetadataProviders().
